name: ARIAReference
0:
”Alexa open ARIA Reference”
”Alexa ask ARIA Reference about the button role”
”tell me about aria pressed”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aria reference
des:
The ARIA Reference skill lets you ask Alexa for information about the roles and attributes in the W3C Accessible Rich Internet Applications (ARIA) specification.

There are more than 70 roles and 45 ARIA prefixed attributes in the ARIA 1.1 specification, and ARIA Reference gives you a convenient way to remind yourself what each one does.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
